projects.name: Business Site
projects.description:
A business one pager with a hero video. The page includes a signup form with text fields and radio buttons.
Technical implementation: HTML, CSS, responsive design with clear structure.

projects.name: Pizzabot
projects.description: An interactive pizza ordering system. Javascript, variables.

projects.name: Library
projects.description: A digital library with a collection of books. Using array and objects to store the data.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: A weather app displaying current weather conditions as well as a 5 day forecast. The project introduced the knowledge of working with API.
